activities: RMS uses the information it collects in its business processes to support and maintain its business relationships and/or the relationships with those with whom we, RMS, and/or our customers do business. RMS will use personal information to facilitate communications, to complete a business transaction and/or to personalize our communications, specifically lettering programs and email messages.  Credit card and Social Security numbers are used for payment processing and/or identification purposes only, and maintained in a secure, PCI-compliant, environment.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: PCI Compliance Program for the security and protection of creditcard holder information.
recoursemech: RMS has elected to use European Data Protection Authorities for dispute resolution. Dispute information forwarded to RMS' Manager-Compliance, will be acted on immediately and within the provisions of the Safe Harbor framework.
